typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		genres as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['id'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id = movie,
		genres,
		name = title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
